about_the_game:
After installing this DLC you will have full access to the sexual content in the DLC, watch the full version of the background pictures of the beauties, and you will be able to start a plot game with the 10 beauties, this DLC contains the full Live2d animation of the 10 beauties, each character has a voice. You can also experience the gallery and mall system in the DLC.
Feature:
-Full sexual content
-10 characters
-All character has it own animations
-10 Visual novels
-Many endings
-Gallery

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may cover sexuality, alcohol and drug use, and may also cover sensitive topics such as sexual assault, self-harm, etc. It is only suitable for responsible and self-controlled users.

detailed_description:
After installing this DLC you will have full access to the sexual content in the DLC, watch the full version of the background pictures of the beauties, and you will be able to start a plot game with the 10 beauties, this DLC contains the full Live2d animation of the 10 beauties, each character has a voice. You can also experience the gallery and mall system in the DLC.
Feature:

-10 characters
-All character has it own animations

name: Scratch Girl - Mystery DLC
